name: Cards of Sacrifice
description:
Cards of Sacrifice is a game made for MiniJam 110: (theme: sacrifice, limitation: failure is inevitable). Kill enemies to claim cards that grant you weapons. Be aware, each card has limited uses and each door requires the sacrifice of one of your weapons to open. (Note: this game was made in 6 days. There are bugs and it can be difficult as well. (the known bugs are not game breaking.))

Controls:

Move = WASD

Select Card = 1, 2

Use Card = M1

Aim Weapon = Mouse Movement

This is a simple project but I hope you guys enjoy it anyway.

The base asset pack is Lazy Fox's 1 bit pack: https://lazy-fox.itch.io/1-bit-8x8-universal-asset

Other assets were edited by me or created by Dall E Mini AI
